attributes.action: Review ending Covid-19 lock-down and social distancing rules.
attributes.additional_details: Lock-down and social distancing is now having a huge detrimental affect on our lives and businesses. Daily average deaths from Covid are in single digits and have been since June 2020. The NHS is now equipped and prepared to cope. Lets move on!!
attributes.background: Review the current social distancing and lock-down rules and remove them entirely. Retain masks if needs be but allow those at risk to self-isolate and safeguard themselves, allowing the rest of the nation and economy to recover.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

End COVID-19 social distancing: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320079

End lockdown to prevent further economic damage to the UK’s economy: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315979

Fund & provide services to allow the vulnerable to shield & re-open the economy: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552023
